document_data.name: Gisentraxia
document_data.mainbody:
'''Gisentraxia''' was a [[bronze dragon]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
{{quote|I've never witnessed a ''[[mythal]]'' of such magnitude! It felt unlike anything I've experienced before. My soul twisted and spun Inside my body as my head filled with countless echoes of my own voice.|Gisentraxia}}
document_data.Description: In her [[human]] form, Gisentraxia appeared to be a light-skinned woman with brown eyes and hair. She wore face paint and had her hair gathered in a bun over an undershave.
document_data.Relationships: She was [[Palhavorithyn]]'s mate and a friend of [[Elminster Aumar]].
document_data.History: In the late 15{{th}} century DR, Gisentraxia aided her friend Elminster in investigating the [[Weave]]. Later, she carried Elminster to the [[Dragonbone Vale]], where the [[Cult of the Dragon]], allied with the [[Red Wizards of Thay]], planned on making the prophecy of the ''[[Chronicle of Years to Come]]'' come true. She assumed her human form while assisting Sergeant [[Alphonse Knox]]'s troops and [[adventurer]]s from [[Neverwinter]], who operated out of the [[Shield of the North]] camp. However, Gisentraxia had a personal stake in the cult's sinister plot; she believed that Palhavorithyn, her beloved, was corrupted by foul magics.
